folder.name: SQLDevUDRepPack v0.1.1
folder.description: ba6.us - SQL Developer Custom Report Library v0.1.1

query.sql: -- Status, Duration, SQL_ID, User, Parallel, Database Time, IO Requests, Start, Ended, SQL Text -- http://download.oracle.com/docs/cd/B28359_01/server.111/b28320/dynviews_3048.htm SELECT Status, TO_CHAR(SQL_EXEC_START,'HH24:MI') as STARTTime, CASE WHEN Status<>'EXECUTING' THEN TO_CHAR(SQL_EXEC_START + (ELAPSED_TIME/1000000/24/60/60),'HH24:MI') WHEN Status IS NULL THEN NULL END as SQL_EXEC_END, ROUND(ELAPSED_TIME/1000000)||'s' as Duration, (SELECT USERNAME FROM V$SESSION WHERE v$SESSION.SID=mon.SID) AS USERNAME, SID, SQL_ID, SQL_PLAN_HASH_VALUE as PlanHashVal, -- Sorry, this distinct is ugly but gets the job done (SELECT DISTINCT SQL_TEXT FROM V$SQL WHERE V$SQL.SQL_ID=MON.SQL_ID) AS SQL_TEXT, KEY FROM v$sql_monitor mon ORDER BY SUBSTR(STATUS,1,4) DESC, SQL_EXEC_START DESC;
select * From v$sql_plan_monitor where key = :key

WITH DataQuery as (select key, ROUND(ELAPSED_TIME/1000000,2) as ELAPSED_TIME, ROUND(USER_IO_WAIT_TIME/1000000,2) as IO_TIME, ROUND((APPLICATION_WAIT_TIME+CONCURRENCY_WAIT_TIME+CLUSTER_WAIT_TIME+PLSQL_EXEC_TIME+JAVA_EXEC_TIME)/1000000,2) as OTHER_TIME, ROUND(CPU_TIME/1000000,2) as CPU_TIME from v$sql_monitor where status <> 'EXECUTING') SELECT DATAQUERY.*, 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:'||(IO_TIME+OTHER_TIME+CPU_TIME)*100|| ':'||IO_TIME*100||':'||(IO_TIME+OTHER_TIME)*100||':0' as "RedIO|YellowOther|GreenCPU" FROM DataQuery

SET LONG 1000000 SET LONGCHUNKSIZE 1000000 SET LINESIZE 1000 SET PAGESIZE 0 SET TRIM ON SET TRIMSPOOL ON SET ECHO OFF SET FEEDBACK OFF
SELECT DBMS_SQLTUNE.report_sql_monitor( sql_id => :sqlid, type => 'TEXT', report_level => 'ALL') AS report FROM dual;

select s1.username || '@' || s1.machine || ' ( SID=' || s1.sid || ' ) is blocking ' || s2.username || '@' || s2.machine || ' ( SID=' || s2.sid || ' ) ' AS blocking_status from v$lock l1, v$session s1, v$lock l2, v$session s2 where s1.sid=l1.sid and s2.sid=l2.sid and l1.BLOCK=1 and l2.request > 0 and l1.id1 = l2.id1 and l2.id2 = l2.id2

-- In Flight SQL (SQL as CLOB) SELECT nvl(ses.username,'ORACLE PROC')||' ('||ses.sid||')' UNAM, machine, ltrim(to_char(floor(SES.LAST_CALL_ET/3600), '09')) || ':' || ltrim(to_char(floor(mod(SES.LAST_CALL_ET, 3600)/60), '09')) || ':' || ltrim(to_char(mod(SES.LAST_CALL_ET, 60), '09')) RUNT, SQL_FULLTEXT STMT, 'ALTER SYSTEM KILL SESSION ''' || SID || ',' || SERIAL# || ''';' as killstmt, ses.sql_id FROM V$SESSION SES, V$SQL SQL where SES.STATUS = 'ACTIVE' and SES.USERNAME is not null and SES.SQL_ADDRESS = SQL.ADDRESS and SES.SQL_HASH_VALUE = SQL.HASH_VALUE and Ses.AUDSID <> userenv('SESSIONID') order by runt desc;
SELECT ROUND(sofar/totalwork*100,2), v$session_longops.* FROM v$session_longops WHERE sofar <> totalwork ORDER BY target, sid
SELECT TO_CHAR(TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as Time, USERNAME, OS_USERNAME, USERHOST FROM DBA_AUDIT_TRAIL WHERE USERNAME=UPPER(:username_like_expr) AND RETURNCODE=1017 ORDER BY TIMESTAMP DESC

display.name: AWR - Performance Detail by Hour for 1 SQL_ID

query.sql: select TO_CHAR(begin_interval_time,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI') || ' - ' || TO_CHAR(end_interval_time,'HH24:MI') as INTERVAL, sql_id, plan_hash_value as "PlanHashValue", ROUND(elapsed_time_total/1000000,2) as "ElapsedTotal", executions_total as "ExecsTotal", ROUND((elapsed_time_total/1000000)/executions_total,2) as "ElapsedPerExec" from dba_hist_sqlstat join dba_hist_snapshot on dba_hist_sqlstat.snap_id=dba_hist_snapshot.snap_id where sql_id IN (TRIM(:sql_id)) and executions_total > 0 ORDER BY DBA_HIST_SNAPSHOT.end_interval_time ASC

display.name: AWR - Performance Summary By Day for 1 SQL_ID

query.sql: select TO_CHAR(TRUNC(end_interval_time),'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI') as Day, sql_id, COUNT(DISTINCT PLAN_HASH_VALUE) as "PlanCnt", ROUND(SUM(elapsed_time_total/1000000),2) as "Total Elapsed", sum(executions_total) as "TotalExecs", ROUND(SUM(elapsed_time_total/1000000)/SUM(executions_total),2) as "AvgTimePerExec", ROUND(MIN(elapsed_time_total/1000000/executions_total),2) as "MinHourlyAvgElapsed", ROUND(MAX(elapsed_time_total/1000000/executions_total),2) as "MaxHourlyAvgElapsed" from dba_hist_sqlstat join dba_hist_snapshot on dba_hist_sqlstat.snap_id=dba_hist_snapshot.snap_id where sql_id IN (:sql_id) and executions_total > 0 GROUP BY TRUNC(end_interval_time), sql_id ORDER BY 1 DESC

display.name: AWR - Longest Running SQL - Last 24 Hours

query.sql: SELECT "SQL_ID", "EXECUTIONS_TOTAL", "TOTAL_SECONDS", "ELAP_PER_EXEC", "SQL_TEXT" FROM( select sql.sql_id, ROUND(elapsed_time_total/1000000/executions_total,2) as elap_per_exec, executions_total, round(elapsed_time_total/1000000,2) as total_seconds, sql_text From dba_hist_snapshot snap join dba_hist_sqlstat sql on snap.snap_id=sql.snap_id join dba_hist_sqltext ON sql.sql_id=dba_hist_sqltext.sql_id WHERE END_INTERVAL_TIME > (SYSDATE-(25/24)) AND executions_total > 0 ORDER BY 2 DESC )

-- Child report: -- http://www.thatjeffsmith.com/archive/2012/01/sweet-child-report-o-mine/ SELECT SNAP_ID, INSTANCE_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as BEGIN_TIME, EXTRACT( HOUR FROM (END_INTERVAL_TIME-BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME))*60+ EXTRACT( MINUTE FROM (END_INTERVAL_TIME-BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME)) AS MINUTES, DBID FROM dba_hist_snapshot ORDER BY SNAP_ID DESC, INSTANCE_NUMBER ASC;

display.name: AWR Reports By Snap - Detail as Text

query.sql: SELECT output FROM TABLE (dbms_workload_repository.awr_report_text (:DBID,:INSTANCE_NUMBER,:SNAP_ID,:SNAP_ID+1 ) )

display.name: AWR Reports By Snap - Detail as HTML

query.sql: SELECT output FROM TABLE (dbms_workload_repository.awr_report_html (:DBID,:INSTANCE_NUMBER,:SNAP_ID,:SNAP_ID+1 ) )

-- Historical RowCounts From Stats History WITH TableList AS (SELECT object_id, OWNER, object_name FROM dba_objects WHERE object_type='TABLE' AND object_name = UPPER(:TNAME) ) , HistTableInfo AS (SELECT TableList.OWNER, OBJECT_NAME AS TABLE_NAME, TO_CHAR(ANALYZETIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS AnalyzeTime, OTH.ROWCNT FROM SYS.WRI$_OPTSTAT_TAB_HISTORY OTH, TableList WHERE OTH.OBJ# = TableList.OBJECT_ID ), CurrTableInfo AS (SELECT TableList.OWNER, TABLE_NAME, TO_CHAR(LAST_ANALYZED,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS AnalyzeTime, num_rows AS ROWCNT FROM DBA_TABLES, TableList WHERE DBA_TABLES.TABLE_NAME = TableList.object_name AND DBA_TABLES.OWNER = TableList.owner) SELECT * FROM HistTableInfo UNION SELECT * FROM CurrTableInfo ORDER BY 1,2,3;

SELECT ATM.TABLE_OWNER, ATM.TABLE_NAME, ATM.PARTITION_NAME, AT.NUM_ROWS AS Analyzed_Num_Rows, ATM.INSERTS, ATM.UPDATES, ATM.DELETES, (ATM.INSERTS +ATM.UPDATES+ATM.DELETES) AS Changes, ROUND(((ATM.INSERTS+ATM.UPDATES+ATM.DELETES)/NUM_ROWS)*100,2) AS pct, (SELECT LAST_ANALYZED FROM DBA_TABLES WHERE OWNER =ATM.TABLE_OWNER AND TABLE_NAME=ATM.TABLE_NAME ) AS LAST_ANALYZED FROM ALL_TAB_MODIFICATIONS ATM, ALL_TABLES AT WHERE ATM.TABLE_OWNER=AT.OWNER AND ATM.TABLE_NAME =AT.TABLE_NAME AND ATM.TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE 'BIN$%' AND ATM.TABLE_OWNER NOT IN ('SYS') AND NUM_ROWS <> 0 AND ROUND(((ATM.INSERTS+ATM.UPDATES+ATM.DELETES)/NUM_ROWS)*100,2)> 5 ORDER BY 9 DESC

display.name: Stats Survey (Work in Progress)
display.description: Want to add info about any tables that have custom stats parameters that differ from the global defaults.

query.sql: SELECT owner, segment_name, segment_type, partition_name, ROUND(bytes/1024/1024/1024,3) as GB FROM dba_segments ORDER BY bytes desc

-- Redo Log Daily Summary SELECT TRUNC(COMPLETION_TIME,'DD') DAY, thread#, ROUND(SUM(BLOCKS*BLOCK_SIZE)/1048576) MB, COUNT( *) Archives_Generated FROM v$archived_log GROUP BY TRUNC(COMPLETION_TIME,'DD'), thread# ORDER BY 1;

-- Redo Log Hourly Summary SELECT TO_DATE(TRUNC(COMPLETION_TIME,'HH'),'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI') Hour, THREAD# , ROUND(SUM(BLOCKS*BLOCK_SIZE)/(1024*1024)) TOTAL_FILE_MB, COUNT(*) NUM_LOGS FROM v$archived_log GROUP BY TRUNC(COMPLETION_TIME,'HH'), THREAD# ORDER BY 1 DESC ;
select * from v$log
SELECT * FROM DBA_DATAPUMP_JOBS

display.name: Memory Resize Operation History (Experimental)
display.description: Need to find a way to smooth out the staggered times that pool resizes happen in order to make things 'nice' on this graph.

query.sql: SELECT END_TIME, COMPONENT, TARGET_SIZE FROM DBA_HIST_MEMORY_RESIZE_OPS ORDER BY UPPER(COMPONENT), END_TIME
SELECT END_TIME, COMPONENT, TARGET_SIZE FROM DBA_HIST_MEMORY_RESIZE_OPS WHERE COMPONENT IN ('PGA Target') ORDER BY END_TIME, COMPONENT
SELECT END_TIME, COMPONENT, TARGET_SIZE FROM DBA_HIST_MEMORY_RESIZE_OPS WHERE COMPONENT IN ('SGA Target') ORDER BY END_TIME, COMPONENT

display.name: Default Buffer Pool Memory Resize Operation History

query.sql: SELECT END_TIME, COMPONENT, TARGET_SIZE FROM DBA_HIST_MEMORY_RESIZE_OPS WHERE COMPONENT IN ('DEFAULT buffer cache') ORDER BY END_TIME, COMPONENT
